name: genesys-dev-icons
description: This project amalgamates public-facing Genesys brand icons, Genesys product icons, and general application iconography into a packaged icon library.

scripts.copy-resources: cp src/resources/genesys-dev-icons.css lib/resources/ && cp src/resources/genesys-dev-icons.eot lib/resources/ && cp src/resources/genesys-dev-icons.woff lib/resources/ && cp src/resources/genesys-dev-icons.woff2 lib/resources/
scripts.test: echo "0/0 tests passed. That's technically a perfect score. Keep up the great work!"

author: Genesys
